segments.pli: “‘So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saṅgaṇikārāmo saṅgaṇikarato saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ anuyutto, gaṇārāmo gaṇarato gaṇārāmataṃ anuyutto, eko paviveke abhiramissatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: “Mendicants, it’s totally impossible that a mendicant who enjoys company and groups, who loves them and likes to enjoy them, should take pleasure in being alone in seclusion.

segments.pli: ‘Eko paviveke anabhiramanto cittassa nimittaṃ gahessatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without taking pleasure in being alone in seclusion, it’s impossible to learn the patterns of the mind.

segments.pli: ‘Cittassa nimittaṃ agaṇhanto sammādiṭṭhiṃ paripūressatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without learning the patterns of the mind, it’s impossible to fulfill right view.

segments.pli: ‘Sammādiṭṭhiṃ aparipūretvā sammāsamādhiṃ paripūressatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without fulfilling right view, it’s impossible to fulfill right immersion.

segments.pli: ‘Sammāsamādhiṃ aparipūretvā saṃyojanāni pajahissatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without fulfilling right immersion, it’s impossible to give up the fetters.

segments.pli: ‘Saṃyojanāni appahāya nibbānaṃ sacchikarissatī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: Without giving up the fetters, it’s impossible to realize extinguishment.

segments.pli: ‘So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na saṅgaṇikārāmo na saṅgaṇikarato na saṅgaṇikārāmataṃ anuyutto, na gaṇārāmo na gaṇarato na gaṇārāmataṃ anuyutto, eko paviveke abhiramissatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: It’s totally possible that a mendicant who doesn’t enjoy company and groups, who doesn’t love them and like to enjoy them, should take pleasure in being alone in seclusion.

segments.pli: ‘Eko paviveke abhiramanto cittassa nimittaṃ gahessatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: For someone who takes pleasure in being alone in seclusion, it’s possible to learn the patterns of the mind.

segments.pli: ‘Cittassa nimittaṃ gaṇhanto sammādiṭṭhiṃ paripūressatī’ti ṭhānametaṃ vijjati.
segments.en: For someone who learns the patterns of the mind, it’s possible to fulfill right view.
Having fulfilled right view, it’s possible to fulfill right immersion.
Having fulfilled right immersion, it’s possible to give up the fetters.
Having given up the fetters, it’s possible to realize extinguishment.”

suttaplex.blurb: A mendicant who loves to socialize can’t find peace in meditation, but one who loves solitude can.
